mapper.insert: insert into tb_product (code, name, price, company_id, info, spec, insert_date, insert_timestamp, amount, inventory_amount, image_url, thumbnail_url) values(#{code}, #{name}, #{price}, #{companyId}, #{info}, #{spec}, (select now()), (select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()), #{amount}, #{amount}, #{imageUrl}, #{thumbnailUrl})

insert into tb_product_selling (code, company_id, selling_amount, start_date, start_timestamp, end_date, end_timestamp) values(#{code}, #{companyId}, #{sellingAmount}, (SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTimestamp},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')), #{startTimestamp}, (SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endTimestamp},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')), #{endTimestamp})
